goal: stir the mixture of water and kool-aid
steps: move arm in circles to stir

branching_info.branching_step: move arm in circles to stir
branching_info.option 1: do not stop stirring until fullly mixed
branching_info.option 2: during stirring, stop every once in a while to check if the mix is ready
freeform_ra: the mixture is for a weekend party
there is a risk of the mix being over-stirred
